factText: Tornado Warnings for the following areas in Texas: Reno, Paris, Detroit, Clarkesville, Bogota & Talco. #Tornado Watch has been issued for eastern Tennessee and North East Georgia until 10:00p ET.
They are intensely monitored by the BHERTs.

Georgia, Oklahoma, Alaska and several other states have taken tentative steps at reopening businesses.

. Officials yesterday opened up three areas of Onalaska that were previously restricted.

#Severe storms are targeting the Tennessee Valley and Carolinas today, with gusty winds and damaging #hail as the main threats. High-based tornado action in Northeast Texas, looking more like eastern Colorado in the summer. Strong storms possible this afternoon and evening for parts of the US.

Texas Baptist Men are providing physical and spiritual assistance to families affected by the EF-3 tornado that hit Onalaska, TX, Wednesday evening. On Saturday morning, 16 members of the Texas A&M Veterinary Emergency Team headed out to Onalaska to support tornado recovery. This morning, 17 members deployed to Polk County to care for animals injured in Wednesday’s tornado.
223 homes & 58 businesses were demolished. But on April 22, an EF2 tornado pummeled the small-town church, blowing out most of the stained glass windows and tearing off half the roof.

factText: Two days of severe storms and tornadoes across the southern part of the U.S. led to the deaths of at least seven people and resulted in widespread damage.
The tornado was about 1/2 mile wide.

factText: Clean up has been underway for a few days now. Now more than ever is the time to be ready and be prepared.

This month, a #tornado tore through the Cedar Island #community of Moncks Corner, South Carolina. 

. On this day in 1994 a short lived F4 tornado struck south of Dallas, Texas.
We are looking for donations or pet supplies to donate to facilities impacted by this devastation.

factText: Clarruth Seaton of The American Red Cross gives a mask for COVID-19 prevention to 7 yr old Ariya Cates, as Iva Weiss, a friend of her family, looks on at hotel where the Red Cross is providing emergency lodging for tornado victims in Livingston, TX on Friday, April 24, 2020. The Center of Hope will remain open Monday - Saturday from 8AM - 5PM and on Sundays from 1PM - 5PM to accept donations for those impacted by the storm.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-017_Tornado_What emergency shelters are open specifically for tornado victims?

factText: They are working on it, but due to the remote location of the fault and the repairs that are required, it may be noon tomorrow (Sunday) before power is restored in those two areas. Daytime heating/instability is fueling these right now.
One family survived an EF3 tornado in Texas by hiding in their garden tub.

A #TORNADO May have swept through Salem, SC. Local FLASH FLOODING in the towns and streams could occur. During the next 24hrs, isolated pockets of #Haryana and #Delhi may get patchy rains. A risk for severe storms is ongoing today over the Lower Ohio Valley/Mid-South to Mid-Atlantic.  . Damaging hail storm last night in Bossier City, Louisiana. On Sunday the 19th of April, a storm cell moved from Rockhampton to Mackay, pelting homes, cars, and farms with hail as big as grapefruit and larger.

Onalaska was hit by a deadly tornado Wednesday causing great destruction to numerous homes. A couple of days ago, a powerful tornado devastated the many homes and businesses in Onalaska, Texas, in Polk County. #TORNADO WARNING Update: #Greenville Co. is now included: Travelers Rest & Berea. Polk County, Texas, Tornado: Photos & Videos Show Massive Damage

I hope everyone is staying safe as we are seeing multiple #Tornado Warnings across the Upstate. TORNADO WARNING is in effect for Titus and Franklin counties. #Tornado Warning for Lamar-TX until 8:15 PM Source: Weather Spotters Confirmed Tornado. #Tornado Warning for Greenville-SC & Pickens-SC until 6:45 PM Source: Radar Indicated Rotation. #Tornado Watch for the Upstate until 10PM with some #Warnings this evening.
If you're in this area, seek shelter NOW and monitor local media.
